dialogue.state: now sitting up, no longer lying down
dialogue.text: Afterwards, he wanted to talk about something I was not expecting.

visual_elements.evan_appearance: alert, sitting upright, emergence from trance
visual_elements.posture: transition from horizontal vulnerability to vertical attention
visual_elements.environment: therapy room coming back into focus
visual_elements.lighting: normal room lighting replacing hypnotic ambiance

psychological_notes: The surprise indicates Evan's preconceptions about what spiritual/therapeutic experiences 'should' address. The voice defies expectations, suggesting authentic wisdom doesn't follow our scripts.
philosophical_underpinning: Truth arrives through the unexpected; our preparations often prepare us for the wrong revelations
therapeutic_direction: Opening to unanticipated insights beyond our defensive preparations
